Erick Thohir Beri Bocoran Kriteria Dirut Holding Tambang
05 Nov 2019, 07:40 by Vadhia Lidyana


Foto: Muhammad Ridho

Jakarta - Menteri BUMN Erick Thohir membeberkan kriteria pengisi jabatan Direktur Utama holding BUMN tambang, MIND ID. Ada dua aspek yang harus diisi pengganti mantan Dirut Inum Budi Gunadi Sadikin tersebut.Pertama, calon Dirut MIND ID harus memiliki latar belakang di dunia pertambangan. Latar belakangnya itu harus membantunya memahami keanekaragaman bidang usaha anak perusahaan MIND ID:"Karena ini banyak industri pertambangan ya kita harapkan juga orang yang punya background di pertambangan. Apalagi kan diversifikasi di anak perusahaan cukup berbeda ada, Antam ada batubara, ada lain lain," ungkap Erick usai menghadiri rapat koordinasi di kantor Kemenko Perekonomian, Jakarta, Selasa (5/11/2019).Kedua, calon Dirut MIND ID juga harus memiliki latar bidang keuangan yang kuat. Pasalnya, sebagai holding pertambangan pastinya Dirut MIND ID harus bisa mengontrol keuangan anak perusahaannya."Pasti kita mengharapkan dia punya background financial yang kuat karena memang sebagai holding dia harus mengerti kondisi keuangan dari anak perusahaannya," papar dia.Dalam pemilihan pengisi jabatan Dirut MIND ID ini, ia akan melalui proses di Tim Penilai Akhir (TPA). Pasalnya, MIND ID termasuk 30 perusahaan BUMN terbesar."Saya rasa 25-30 perusahaan besar berdasarkan aset revenue profit sebaiknya di TPA biar transparan pemilihannya, dan pihak yang menfapat kesempatan memimpin dapat menjalankan tugas dengan baik," jelasnya.Ia menegaskan kepada pengisi jabatan tertinggi di MIND ID tersebut harus mau berkeringat, dan tak boleh hanya duduk-duduk saja."Jangan hanya seperti duduk di jabatan tapi nggak berkeringat. Ini bukan berarti politik tapi nggak mau kerja. Mohon maaf hari ini juga banyak terobosan-terobosan yang kita sampaikan ke Pak Menko yang insyaallah jadi percepatan, yang selama ini lambat," tegas Erick.Sebelumnya, Erick pernah mengatakan bahwa pihaknya akan menyiapkan tiga kandidat untuk mengisi jabatan Dirut MIND ID."Pasti masing-masing posisi, atau untuk satu posisi kan giga kandidat. Nanti ditentukan mana yang terbaik, dilihat track record-nya, dilihat juga hal-hal lain baru nanti dipilih," kata Erick saat mengunjungi kantor Kementerian PUPR, di Jakarta, Sabtu (26/10/2019). Erick Thohir Provides Leakage Criteria for Managing Directors of Mining Holding
05 Nov 2019, 07:40 by Vadhia Lidyana


Photo: Muhammad Ridho

Jakarta - SOE Minister Erick Thohir revealed criteria for filling in the position of Managing Director of a holding BUMN mine, MIND ID. There are two aspects that must be filled by the successor to the former Director of Inum Budi Gunadi Sadikin. His background should help him understand the diversity of the business fields of the MIND subsidiary ID: "Because there are many mining industries, we hope that people who have a background in mining, especially if diversification in subsidiaries is quite different, Antam has coal, there are others," said Erick after attending a coordination meeting at the Coordinating Ministry for the Economy, Jakarta, Tuesday (11/5/2019). Secondly, candidates for the Managing Director of MIND ID must also have a strong financial background. The reason is that as a mining holding director, the Managing Director of MIND ID must be able to control the finances of his subsidiary. "Surely we expect him to have a strong financial background because as a holding he must understand the financial condition of his subsidiary," he explained. this, he will go through a process in the Final Assessment Team (TPA). The reason is that MIND ID is among the 30 largest state-owned companies. "I think that 25-30 large companies based on revenue-profit assets should be in the TPA so that the election is transparent, and those who have the opportunity to lead can carry out their duties properly," he explained. at the MIND ID you have to want to sweat, and you can't just sit around. "Don't just like sitting in a position but don't sweat. This doesn't mean politics but you don't want to work. Sorry today too many breakthroughs that we convey to The Coordinating Minister, God willing, is accelerating, which has been slow, "said Erick. Previously, Erick had said that his party would prepare three candidates to fill the position of Managing Director of the MIND ID." Certainly each position, or for one position is a giga candidate. Later determined which is the best, viewed from its track record, seen also other new things will be selected later, "said Erick when visiting the Ministry of PUPR office , in Jakarta, Saturday (10/26/2019).
